column7: Provides credit toward the undergraduate degree for study at accredited foreign institutions or approved overseas programs. Final determination of credit is made upon the student's completion of the work. Approved for Letter and S/U grading. Prerequisite: One year of residence at UIUC; good academic standing, and prior approval of the College of Media.
